activateReward(address).details: Enables a distributor contract to activate reward for a token

params._tokenAddr: the token the distributor contract is adding a reward for

proxiableUUID().details: Proxiable UUID marker function.      This would help to avoid wrong logic contract to be used for upgrading.

setDistributorStatus(address,bool).details: approves a distributor contract for a token

params._approve: the status of the distributor contract
